page.title: 03Developing the Moor.
page.content: {The Quarry Moor Development {Association}are hoping to develop the land as a place for children to play. However, in order to apply for grants from bodies like the{Sports Council and the{National Playing Fields {Association,}the Development Association requires a lease. Hopefully,with rightful ownership being given to the City Council,this can now be acquired. The Association have already done a great deal of work on the site. This includes the building of a Trim Track, seeding a games area, providing opportunities for nature walks and building an activities centre for use by organised groups. The area is of some interest to the{National {Conservancy Council}as a variety of rare plants and associated wildlife has been discovered.
